1029.issue: [E1029] Admin support not specified. Please add "common.adminUI.config = json|materialize|html|none"

1032.issue: [W1032] Many "common.news" found in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/io-package.json). Repository builder will truncate at 7 news. Please remove old news.

1034.issue: [W1034] Missing suggested translation into pt,nl,fr,it,es,pl,uk,zh-cn of "common.desc" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/io-package.json).

1054.issue: [W1054] Missing suggested translation into uk,pt,nl,fr,it,es,pl,zh-cn of some "common.news" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/io-package.json).

1062.issue: [E1062] js-controller dependency missing. js-controller 5.0.19 is required as minimum, 6.0.11 is recommended. Please add to dependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/io-package.json).

1081.issue: [W1081] "common.license" in [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/io-package.json) is deprecated. Please define object "common.licenseInformation"

1084.issue: [W1084] "common.title" is deprecated and replaced by "common.titleLang". Please remove from [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/io-package.json).

1090.issue: [E1090] admin dependency missing. admin 6.17.14 is required as minimum, 7.6.17 is recommended. Please add to globalDependencies at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/io-package.json).

1105.issue: [W1105] [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/io-package.json) schema validation error: Missing required property "titleLang" in /common

2004.issue: [E2004] Versions "1.3.0, 1.0.6" listed at common.news at [io-package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/io-package.json) do not exist at [NPM](https://www.npmjs.com/package/iobroker.rflink). Please remove from news section.

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5013.issue: [W5013] "gulpfile.js" found in repo! Think about migrating to @iobroker/adapter-dev package

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

7001.issue: [E7001] No actual year found in LICENSE. Please add "Copyright (c) 2016-2025 bluefox <dogafox@gmail.com>" at the start of LICENSE

8004.issue: [W8004] Please process issue [[#58] "Migration to ESLint 9 and @iobroker/eslint-config"](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/issues/58)

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0029.issue: [E0029] Node.js 18 is required as minimum, node.js 20 is recommended. Please change "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '8.0.0' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/package.json).

0033.issue: [E0033] @iobroker/adapter-core 3.1.6 specified. 3.2.3 is required as minimum, 3.3.2 (or newer) is current. Please update dependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/package.json)

0035.issue: [E0035] No devDependency declared for @iobroker/testing. Please add "@iobroker/testing":"5.2.2" to devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/package.json)

0036.issue: [E0036] @alcalzone/release-script 2.2.2 specified. 3.8.0 is required as minimum,  5.0.0 (or newer) is current. Please update devDependencies at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/package.json)

0048.issue: [S0048] At least one devDpendency at [package.json](https://github.com/ioBroker/ioBroker.rflink/blob/master/package.json) requires a specific version. Consider using "~1.2.3" or "^1.2.3" syntax unless freezing dependencies is really desired.

0050.issue: [W0050] 'request' package is deprecated and no longer maintained. Consider migrating to native 'node:fetch' or 'axios' if more complex functionality is needed.
